bibl.seg: WEST Martin L. (Edited and Translated by), Homeric Hymns. Homeric Apocrypha. Lives of Homer. (The Loeb Classical Library. 496.)
Cambridge, Mass. - London, Harvard University Press, 2003, 8Â°, xii-467 pp. ISBN 0-674-99606-2. $21.50.

See in part. pp. 240-255: Homeric Apocrypha. Margites, P. Oxy. XXII, 2309 (= Pack2 1232); - 258-263: The Battle of the Weasel and the Mice, P. Mich. Inv. 6946 [ed.: Hermann S. SCHIBLI, Fragments of a Weasel and Mouse War, ZPE 53 (1983) pp. 1-25 et pll. I-IV].

C.R. par Richard Janko, CR N.S., 54 (2004) pp. 283-286 [concerne aussi: Martin L. WEST (Edited and Translated by), Greek Epic Fragments from the Seventh to the Fifth Centuries B.C. (Cambridge, Mass. - London, 2003)].
